Property Description

Key features

  • SEMI-DETACHED
  • 3 BEDROOMS
  • STUNNING REAR GARDEN
  • OFF-ROAD PARKING
  • GARAGE
  • GREAT LOCATION
  • SPACIOUS ROOM DIMENSIONS
  • BEAUTIFUL KITCHEN/DINING ROOM

Full description

Tenure: Freehold


SUMMARY
**SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME** providing a STUNNING KITCHEN/DINER and WONDERFUL ROOM DIMENSIONS. Upstairs you will find THREE BEDROOMS and MAIN BATHROOM, whilst outside is complimented by a FANTASTIC REAR GARDEN as well as GARAGE and OFF STREET PARKING TO FRONT.


DESCRIPTION
Perfect family home up for grabs! This well presented semi-detached three bedroom property comes with a generous layout from top to bottom. Downstairs you will find a spacious lounge with a bay window, which really does maximise the light and space. There is a stunning open plan kitchen/diner and sliding doors looking out to the rear garden which means this really is a perfect space to entertain family and friends. Upstairs you will find two double bedrooms, a generous single bedroom and the bathroom. The outside space is just as impressive. The wonderful size south easterly facing rear garden is a haven when the sun decides to show itself, and is also where you will find the secure garage. Within walking distance to BBA secondary school, Barton Hill fields and major bus routes running to and from the city centre, we are sure you would agree that the location is fantastic. This property provides off road parking to the front for at least two cars. We are sure you will love this property as much as us, and we strongly recommend that you call us today to arrange your appointment to view.

Entrance Hall 
Full upvc door to front, double glazed side panels, under stairs sitting area and radiator.

Lounge 12' 10" into bay x 13' 6" max ( 3.91m into bay x 4.11m max )
Double glazed window to front, two radiators, television point and feature fireplace,

Dining Room  11' 4" x 12' max ( 3.45m x 3.66m max )
Double glazed sliding door, radiator and feature fireplace

Kitchen 8' 9" max x 14' 3" ( 2.67m max x 4.34m )
Work surfaces, single bowl sink, part tiling, space for range cooker with cooker hood over, space for fridge/freezer and Worcester central heating boiler. Double glazed window to rear and door to rear garden

Landing 
Loft access.

Bedroom 1 11' 1" x 11' 2" max ( 3.38m x 3.40m max )
Double glazed window to front and radiator.

Bedroom 2 10' 2" x 12' 1" max ( 3.10m x 3.68m max )
Double glazed window to rear and radiator

Bedroom 3 7' 11" x 8' 2" ( 2.41m x 2.49m )
Double glazed window to rear and radiator.

Bathroom  
Double glazed window to rear, bath with mixer taps, shower over and part tiling around the shower. Wash hand basin, extractor fan, shaver point and wc.

Front Garden 
Off street parking for at least two vehicles.

Rear Garden 
Mainly laid to lawn with patio area and summer house.

Garage 9' 4" x 16' ( 2.84m x 4.88m )
Power, light and stable door.

2: These particulars do not constitute part or all of an offer or contract.
3: The measurements indicated are supplied for guidance only and as such must be considered incorrect.
4: Potential buyers are advised to recheck the measurements before committing to any expense.
5: Connells has not tested any apparatus, equipment, fixtures, fittings or services and it is the buyers interests to check the working condition of any appliances.
6: Connells has not sought to verify the legal title of the property and the buyers must obtain verification from their solicitor.
